Uses of Class
renderer.AbstRenderer

  • Packages that use AbstRenderer 
    Package Description
    renderer
    Provides Render engines implementing the graphical interface.
    scenegraph
    Provides classes for all scene graph components: cameras, lights, geometries, materials, colors with all their attributes.

    • Uses of AbstRenderer in renderer

      Subclasses of AbstRenderer in renderer 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Ogl3Renderer
      OpenGL Renderer (LWJGL version) - only using OpenGL core functionality.
      class  OglRenderer
      OpenGL Renderer (LWJGL version) - using fixed functions.

    • Uses of AbstRenderer in scenegraph

      Methods in scenegraph with parameters of type AbstRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean AbstNode.draw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes this object to the renderer (if it is not hidden).
      boolean AbstSpatial.draw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes this object to the renderer (if it is not hidden).
      void AbstLight.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Tells the renderer to attach the light to the scene
      abstract void AbstNode.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      needs to be overridden in derived classes, as objects have different rendering needs.
      abstract void AbstSpatial.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      needs to be overridden in derived classes, as objects have different rendering needs.
      void ColorState.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes the color state to the renderer.
      void Group.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Conserves render state by pushing it to the renderer's stack, then iterate through the children and draw them (they could put own render states on the stack); at the end remove the render state for this group again, because the whole group has been drawn.
      void Line.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes the line object to the renderer
      void MaterialState.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes the material state to the renderer
      void ParticleGroup.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes the point object to the renderer
      void PerspectiveCamera.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      the camera is an invisible part of the scene, so there is nothing to draw
      void Point.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes the point object to the renderer
      void SkyBox.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)  
      void TextureState.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes the material state to the renderer
      void TriangleMesh.onDraw​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes the triangle mesh to the renderer
      abstract void AbstCamera.setCamera​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Set the renderer.
      void PerspectiveCamera.setCamera​(AbstRenderer renderer)
      Passes the camera to the renderer (to change the renderer's view)
